welcome_message_body: Welcome to Teixeira de Freitas, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: Red Lanches

restaurants.address: Tv. Porto Seguro, 26-B (Av. Mal. Castelo Branco), Teixeira de Freitas, BA
